#### Rating: ★★★★☆

I've been wearing the Jockey trunk for a while now, and overall, I'm quite satisfied with my purchase. The fabric is soft and breathable, providing comfort throughout the day. The waistband is snug without being too tight, and it holds up well after multiple washes.

However, the fit could use some improvement. While the trunks fit well around the waist and hips, they feel a bit loose in the leg area. This occasional looseness sometimes causes them to ride up, which can be a bit inconvenient.

Despite this minor issue, the quality and comfort of the Jockey trunk are impressive. They are durable and maintain their shape over time, making them a reliable choice for everyday wear. If the fit were slightly more tailored, these would be perfect.loo

Jockey underwear deserves a spotlight for its unbeatable comfort and durability. Crafted from high-quality materials, it offers a snug fit without sacrificing breathability. Whether you prefer briefs, boxers, or boxer briefs, Jockey has a style to suit your needs. The waistbands are comfortable and stay in place throughout the day, and the fabric holds up well wash after wash. Overall, Jockey underwear is a reliable choice for everyday wear, providing the support and comfort you need to tackle whatever the day throws your way.

I got it a little bit tight... My waist is 34, and I'm muscular... So L (34) size is perfect for me... but I got M(32) size, and this product is made of cotton. That's why it is tight... Because they're not stretchable...

I have a jockey tactile M size (32-34) product. They are stretchable, and that's why they are perfect for 34 waist...

So, guys, I hope you'll find this review helpful...

I've been wearing the Jockey trunk for a while now, and overall, I'm quite satisfied with my purchase. The fabric is soft and breathable, providing comfort throughout the day. The waistband is snug without being too tight, and it holds up well after multiple washes.

However, the fit could use some improvement. While the trunks fit well around the waist and hips, they feel a bit loose in the leg area. This occasional looseness sometimes causes them to ride up, which can be a bit inconvenient.

Despite this minor issue, the quality and comfort of the Jockey trunk are impressive. They are durable and maintain their shape over time, making them a reliable choice for everyday wear. If the fit were slightly more tailored, these would be perfect.loo

comments.comment: Over all the fitting is just good. Feeling little tight and tiny for the appropriate size. It could be more comfortable. Thank you Myntra.

The Levi's trunks I purchased from Myntra are simply fantastic. The first thing that struck me was the exceptional quality of the fabric; it's soft, durable, and feels great against the skin. The fit is also spot on, providing excellent support and comfort throughout the day. I appreciate the attention to detail, like the logo branding and the sturdy waistband that doesn't roll or pinch.

What's even better is that these trunks maintain their shape and color even after several washes, which speaks volumes about their durability. They are perfect for everyday wear or even for more active pursuits due to their flexibility and breathability.

Overall, I'm thoroughly impressed with these Levi's trunks from Myntra. They are stylish, comfortable, and long-lasting, making them a great investment for anyone looking for quality underwear. Highly recommended!

#### Rating: ★★★★☆

I've been wearing the Jockey trunk for a while now, and overall, I'm quite satisfied with my purchase. The fabric is soft and breathable, providing comfort throughout the day. The waistband is snug without being too tight, and it holds up well after multiple washes.

However, the fit could use some improvement. While the trunks fit well around the waist and hips, they feel a bit loose in the leg area. This occasional looseness sometimes causes them to ride up, which can be a bit inconvenient.

Despite this minor issue, the quality and comfort of the Jockey trunk are impressive. They are durable and maintain their shape over time, making them a reliable choice for everyday wear. If the fit were slightly more tailored, these would be perfect.loo

The elastic waistband is also very soft and doesn't create stretch marks on the waist and thighs on perspiration. The cloth is really worth the price paid for its quality. In short, you won't regret for buying it at a premium price point for its benefits.
